mapper.insert: INSERT INTO recruitment (USER_ID, COMPANY_NAME, COMPANY_ICON_URL, RECRUITMENT_URL, RECRUITMENT_TITLE, DDAY, REGDATE, MODDATE, LOCATION, CAREER, EDUCATION) VALUES (#{userId}, #{companyName}, #{companyIconUrl}, #{recruitmentUrl}, #{recruitmentTitle}, #{dDay}, #{regDate}, #{modDate}, #{location}, #{career}, #{education})
